channel.title: [TOOL] Agony's Auto Talker [TOOL]
channel.description:
[b] FULLY UPDATED - NO MORE FEATURES! [/b]
Sorry if you downloaded it before and now want the final version.
If you Download it - PLEASE comment!!
----------
Hello all.
I have created a mighty fine piece of Auto-Talking software, specially designed from my personal experience of having to "spam" things in Runescape and on Private Servers and after much soul searching, i've finally decided to release it to the good old public of Moparscape! :)
All of the features are detailed in a ReadMe file which is provided with the download. I'd strongly recommend you read it so that you know how to works it before you unleash it, therefore i've set the automatic window to Notepad so you can have a play around first.
Basic Description of Features:
- Automatic Enter - Automatic Spelling Mistakes (used for selling and buying, makes your autoing look more subtle.) - Automatic Text Effects (random text effects like Glow, Flash, Wave etc) - Automatic Stopping (choose a time limit, and auto-stop after it has expired) - Chosen Text Effects (set your own permanent text effect) - Cycle between 3 different sets of Text (more versatile than previous versions) - Lock on to ANY window you can see the full name of. - Full ranging interval on the text, from 100th of a second to 10 seconds. - Easy to use interface with failsafe built into the code. (simple, close if you spam too much) - Saving your favourite windows for easier access. - Set an overall spam limit, if the limit is reached the program is closed (0 = unlimited). - Spam Security, built in to stop the talker if too many texts are sent in a small amount of time (Can be very easily disabled).
Pictures: There isn't really any way to take many pictures, so i chose 2.
The Interface: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/714sqf.jpg[/img]
In Action (old one, but this feature is the same): [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/25qgg48.jpg[/img]
And lastly of all, the virus scan (hard for me, i use windows defender and it's not good at single files)
Scanning the folder (i had to use one to get it to scan): [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2810mr.jpg[/img]
----
Download Here:
Uppit: http://uppit.com/v/O2BHAE17
----
Please post your comments, thoughts and if you download it PLEASE comment here!
~ Remember the ReadMe ~
Also, if you encounter any bugs or glitches - PLEASE REPORT THEM!! I can correct them and re-post the fixed version, however.. i havn't personally encountered any bugs/glitches yet. So, fingers crossed :)
----
Thanks,
Agony/Skinz

item.title: [TOOL] Agony's Auto Talker [TOOL]
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:19, topic:316459”]Hmm, is that a real law-obiding copyright? Also, you must do copyrights in MULTIPLE countries for it not to be able to be re-produced. Also, your not the only one who has built one of these, so you cannot really protect from someone making one. Plus, this can be made in 5 minutes on Visual Basic. The main tool here is a timer btw.

@TOPIC - Eeh, something like this is not very complex at all, and can be done simply, with more options, in Visual Basic. I’ll give it a 4/10, its fairly messy and not well organised.[/quote]

Its got more features then other autotalkers tbh

Read full topic

item.title: [TOOL] Agony's Auto Talker [TOOL]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Hmm, is that a real law-obiding copyright? Also, you must do copyrights in MULTIPLE countries for it not to be able to be re-produced. Also, your not the only one who has built one of these, so you cannot really protect from someone making one. Plus, this can be made in 5 minutes on Visual Basic. The main tool here is a timer btw.

@TOPIC - Eeh, something like this is not very complex at all, and can be done simply, with more options, in Visual Basic. I’ll give it a 4/10, its fairly messy and not well organised.

Read full topic

item.title: [TOOL] Agony's Auto Talker [TOOL]
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

Programs made in Visual basic, C++ etc, wont always show up on virus scan… I’ve tried! I made a keylogger that worked in Visual Basic (just a test, never keylogged someone Im not that person…) and it didnt show up on VirusTotal.com …

I dont really think you did make a virus into it, but yeeh Good work =)

Read full topic

item.title: [TOOL] Agony's Auto Talker [TOOL]

item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

FULLY UPDATED - NO MORE FEATURES!

Sorry if you downloaded it before and now want the final version.

If you Download it - PLEASE comment!!

Hello all.

I have created a mighty fine piece of Auto-Talking software, specially designed from my personal experience of having to “spam” things in Runescape and on Private Servers and after much soul searching, i’ve finally decided to release it to the good old public of Moparscape!

All of the features are detailed in a ReadMe file which is provided with the download. I’d strongly recommend you read it so that you know how to works it before you unleash it, therefore i’ve set the automatic window to Notepad so you can have a play around first.

Basic Description of Features:

  • Automatic Enter
  • Automatic Spelling Mistakes (used for selling and buying, makes your autoing look more subtle.)
  • Automatic Text Effects (random text effects like Glow, Flash, Wave etc)
  • Automatic Stopping (choose a time limit, and auto-stop after it has expired)
  • Chosen Text Effects (set your own permanent text effect)
  • Cycle between 3 different sets of Text (more versatile than previous versions)
  • Lock on to ANY window you can see the full name of.
  • Full ranging interval on the text, from 100th of a second to 10 seconds.
  • Easy to use interface with failsafe built into the code. (simple, close if you spam too much)
  • Saving your favourite windows for easier access.
  • Set an overall spam limit, if the limit is reached the program is closed (0 = unlimited).
  • Spam Security, built in to stop the talker if too many texts are sent in a small amount of time (Can be very easily disabled).

Pictures: There isn’t really any way to take many pictures, so i chose 2.
